mapper.insert: insert into member(id, name, password, gender, interest, job, address) values(#{ id }, #{ name }, #{ password }, #{ gender }, #{ interest }, #{ job }, #{ address })
mapper.delete: delete from member where id = #{ id }
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{ id }
mapper.update: update member set name = #{ name }, password = #{ password }, gender = #{ gender }, interest = #{ interest }, job = #{ job }, address = #{ address } where id = #{ id }
